page.title: 04A Retired Farmer
page.content: He first came to Elwell near West Buckland 40 years ago when he rented the farm. He now owns it but it is worked for him.It is 70 acres and divided into 13 fields. He has 35 milking cows,40 store cattle and 80 sheep.He buys corn and cow cake but grows the rest of the animal feed.He used to have one tractor and horses.He now has three International and 1 Zetor tractor and 1 Range Rover.He enjoyed life as a farmer and found the main problem was the weather.He found hedges a problem because he had to keep repairing them.People walking dogs across his land was a small problem.He retired in 1977 and enjoys not having to work. Philip Parker
